text:
总结：“在媒体霸权的影响下，我们应该如何看待这两种意识形态呢？”
社会主义学者：“我们应该保持清醒的头脑，认识和接受媒体霸权的存在，同时坚定自己的理想信念，努力推动社会的公平正义与社会发展。”
资本主义学者：“资本主义也在不断调整和改进，我们应该以开放平和的心态看待不同的意识形态，全人类应该共同探索更好的发展道路，努力减少媒体霸权的存在。”
trans:
In summary, “Under the influence of media hegemony, how should we view these two ideologies?”
Socialist scholar: “We should maintain a clear mind, recognize and accept the existence of media hegemony, while steadfastly adhering to our ideals and beliefs, and striving to promote the equity, justice and development of the society.”
Capitalist scholar: “Capitalism is also constantly adjusting and improving, so we should view different ideologies with an open, peaceful mindset. All of humanity should jointly explore better development paths and strive to reduce the presence of media hegemony.”
